member.summary: The heart of Lock it keeps the write lock while transaction is started and released only at the end of process

member.name: T:CompuTec.BaseLayer.Connection.Transactions.TransactionManager
member.summary: This Class is a Global Transaction manager is used for managing transactions and atomic actions in database Is Coherent for Core and Codre 2.0 Projects. You can use this Class to maintain Transactions but all methods exposed by Core and Core2.0 are using This Manager

member.summary: In this method we find if this thread is a part of locking mechanism if so we execute it as is otherwise are applying a lock on TransactionContext That is pure random
